# Excel Dark Theme - VS Code Extension

## Project Overview

A dark VS Code color theme inspired by Microsoft Excel, featuring dark backgrounds with Excel's signature green accent colors.

## Development

- Run `npm install` to install dependencies
- Press F5 to launch Extension Development Host
- Select "Excel Dark" from Color Theme picker

## Theme Colors

- Background: Dark grays (#1e1e1e, #252526)
- Accent: Excel green (#217346, #1D6F42)
- Text: Light gray (#D4D4D4)
